summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4760 for the improvement of Olin Place, as platted in O.W. Harris' Addition, from 15th Avenue North near East Howe Street to 15th Avenue North, near East Garfield Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54420, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
